skill.name: behaviors.skills.primitives.DamageResourceProduction
skill.description:
To damage the production of a set of given resource nodes by decreasing its production efficiency.
When several nodes should be visited, the agent acts on each node by following the order of the elements into the 'resourceNodes' list. If a resource node is localized in a non accessible urban block, agent stays outside the urban block and enacts anyway.

parameter.name: resourceNodes
parameter.description: The resource nodes to enact on.

parameter.name: quantity
parameter.description: The quantity of resource that will be definitely remove from each node production.

link.name: reach
link.description: To enact the decision to "reach" a resource node.

link.name: damageProduction
link.description: To enact the decision to "damage" the production of the issued node.

feedback.name: damaged
feedback.description: Sent once a resource node production have been damaged.

feedback.name: done
feedback.description: Sent when all "ResourceNodes" have been visited.

feedback.name: failed
feedback.description: Sent if the set of "resourceNodes" is empty (no element to act on).
